content.prompt: The overall trend from 1980 to 2010 depicted on the graph was most directly caused by the

choices.label: reliance of the United States on fossil fuels
increasing integration of the United States into the world economy
reforms to the United States social welfare system
boom in the United States financial and stock markets

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
